desc: Welcome to Bodies in Motion Dancewear, we supply a wide range of dance leotards, dance shoes, gymnastic leotards. We cater both male and female dancers and gymnasts with stock from Bloch, Capezio, Roch Valley, Hectic Dancewear, Tappers & Pointers, Grishko and Tendu Instore visits at 50 Derby Road, Long Eaton, NG10 4QP

layout.text: We supply a range of Dance, Gymnastics, Gym and Leisurewear suitable for Adults and Children
